name.baseName: 直接还原铁生产;直接还原铁;煤基直接还原铁

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) production using the Coal-based Direct Reduction (Coal-DRI) process is typically employed in the steelmaking industry to obtain metallic iron from iron ore without melting the ore. This process uses non-coking coal as a reductant in a solid-state reduction of iron oxides. The DRI produced is often used as a feedstock for electric arc furnaces in steel mills, wherein it is melted to produce steel.
煤基直接还原铁（Coal-DRI）生产过程通常用于钢铁制造业，从铁矿石中获得不需要熔化矿石的金属铁。该过程使用非炼焦煤作为还原剂，对氧化铁进行固态还原。生产出的直接还原铁常用作电弧炉的原料，在钢厂中被熔化以生产钢材。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.

technology.technologicalApplicability: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) production using the Coal-based Direct Reduction (Coal-DRI) process is typically employed in the steelmaking industry to obtain metallic iron from iron ore without melting the ore. This process uses non-coking coal as a reductant in a solid-state reduction of iron oxides. The DRI produced is often used as a feedstock for electric arc furnaces in steel mills, wherein it is melted to produce steel.
煤基直接还原铁（Coal-DRI）生产过程通常用于钢铁制造业，从铁矿石中获得不需要熔化矿石的金属铁。该过程使用非炼焦煤作为还原剂，对氧化铁进行固态还原。生产出的直接还原铁常用作电弧炉的原料，在钢厂中被熔化以生产钢材。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using life cycle inventory (LCI) data of the Coal-based Direct Reduction (Coal-DRI) routes, ensure that the data is applicable to the specific geographic location and technological context of your assessment. The LCI data should be consistent with the average operating data of demonstration projects in China. When considering COG-DR and H-DR routes, be aware that the data for these processes is estimated based on Coal-DR combined with literature data and therefore may require additional validation. The projection of these routes for large-scale industrial application should be made with caution due to technological and scale extrapolation risks.
在使用煤基直接还原（Coal-DRI）路线的生命周期清单（LCI）数据时，请确保数据适用于您评估的特定地理位置和技术背景。LCI数据应与中国示范项目的平均运行数据一致。对于COG-DR和H-DR路线，由于这些过程的数据是基于Coal-DRI与文献数据结合估算的，因此可能需要额外的验证。由于技术和规模外推的风险，对这些路线进行大型工业应用的预测应谨慎进行。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.
